name: Avi
description: Avi is a high-CBD strain grown by Canadian LP Peace Naturals Project, Inc. It is a balanced hybrid, 50% indica and 50% sativa, with a 2:1 CBD:THC ratio. Its pungent aroma carries sweet hints of fruit and berry that create relaxing and calming effects perfect for relieving body aches and pains.
descriptionPlain: Avi is a high-CBD strain grown by Canadian LP Peace Naturals Project, Inc. It is a balanced hybrid, 50% indica and 50% sativa, with a 2:1 CBD:THC ratio. Its pungent aroma carries sweet hints of fruit and berry that create relaxing and calming effects perfect for relieving body aches and pains.

highlightedReviews.text: With a 2:1 CBD/THC ratio, this strain shouldn't get you too "high".  I cannot tolerate high amounts of THC so I thought this strain would be perfect.   It wasn't.   I don't know if it's just this particular crop,  but this was not the medicinal Avi-dekel I was led to believe it was (maybe that's why this shop now calls it something different (YiLo CBD) but,  when I bought it,  it was listed as Avi-dekel).  Regardless, I advise others to be very careful - one of the side effects of this strain was extreme depression.  EXTREME.   I am not depressed,  have never been treated for depression and have never had problem with depression but,  about 5 days after starting to use this strain,  I became very depressed.   While under its influence, the depressive effect was overwhelming. Absolutely horrible.  The heavy depressive effects lasted for about 5 hours after. I finally just stopped using it - still having a fair amount of it left.   That's how bad the depression was.
absolutely love this. helps my sleep and anxiety issues. don't feel high but feel relaxed.

articles.title: New Strains Alert: CBD Shark, Afghan Hawaiian, 13 Dawgs, Damn Sour, and More
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
The Leafly strain database now exceeds 1,200 varieties, but our collection is far from finished. These ten strains are only a few among many newly added varieties, so don't forget to check out all of the other newcomers in the Explorer!
 
   1. CBD Shark
Characteristics of CBD Shark:

80/20 high-CBD indica-dominant strain
Cross between Shark Shock and an unknown high-CBD variety
Fruity, herbal aroma
Clear-headed, soothing effects
May help with pain, anxiety, and inflammation

 
   2. Afghan Hawaiian
Characteristics of Afghan Hawaiian:

Indica-dominant strain
Cross between UK Cheese and Lavender
Sweet and earthy cheese aroma
Euphoric and relaxing
May help with neurological disorders and spasticity

 
   3. 13 Dawgs
Characteristics of 13 Dawgs:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between G13 and Chemdawg
Woody, citrus aroma
Happy, relaxed, focused effects
May help with depression and appetite loss

 
   4. Damn Sour
Characteristics of Damn Sour:

Mostly sativa strain
Bred from Sage N Sour genetics
Sour, diesel aroma
Uplifting and intensely euphoric
May help with aches and appetite loss

 
   5. Afghani CBD
Characteristics of Afghani CBD:

High-CBD variant of the landrace indica Afghani
Earthy, hashy aroma
Relaxing, therapeutic properties
May help with insomnia, chronic pain, and stress disorders

 
   6. Aberdeen
Characteristics of Aberdeen:

Variety of Agent Orange
Cross between Orange Velvet and Jack the Ripper
Sweet orange and citrus aroma
Happy, uplifting effects
May help with anxiety, migraines, and gastrointestinal disorders

 
   7. Jenni
Characteristics of Jenni:

Mostly sativa strain
Modest THC level suitable for novice consumers
Sweet, fruity aroma
Soothing, clear-headed effects

 
   8. Bedica
Characteristics of Bedica:

Mostly indica strain
Sedating, calming effects
May help with stress and insomnia

 
   9. Avi
Characteristics of Avi:

50/50 high-CBD hybrid strain
Sweet fruit and berry aroma
Relaxing and calming effects
May help with body aches and pains

 
   10. Argyle
Characteristics of Argyle:

Indica-dominant high-CBD hybrid
Variety of Nordle (cross between Afghani and Sensi Star)
Herbal, fruity aroma
Mellow, calming buzz
May help with pain and muscle spasms

articles.title: 5 Great Pain Relief, High-CBD Cannabis Strains from Israel
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
For some, it may come as a surprise that Israel stands among the global leaders in medicinal cannabis research. Discoveries made in the footsteps of Raphael Mechoulam (the internationally acclaimed researcher who first isolated THC) have brought new meaning to medical cannabis as strains are engineered to contain optimal levels of cannabinoids.
Here are just a few strains from the Israeli cannabis supplier Tikun Olam that we recently added to the Leafly Explorer. Most of them are low- to moderate-THC and high-CBD, meaning they offer imperceptible psychoactive effects but strong medical relief from pain symptoms. One strain, however, is a balanced blend of low-to-moderate THC and CBD. Enjoy!
1. Avi-Dekel
Characteristics of Avi-Dekel:

Sativa-dominant
Tests up to 16.3% CBD
Non-psychoactive; THC content as low as 0.8%
May treat inflammation, sleep disorders, and indigestion

2. Midnight
Characteristics of Midnight:

Sativa-dominant
Tests up to 12.4% CBD
THC content of about 12.7%
Controls pain, inflammation, and indigestion

3. Eran Almog
Characteristics of Eran Almog:

80% indica
Tests up to 28% THC
May treat sleep disorders, nausea, inflammation, pain, and indigestion

4. El-Na 
Characteristics of El-Na: 

A 50/50 hybrid 
Balanced THC (as low as 8.2%) and CBD (up to 6.5%) for patients unaccustomed to psychoactive effects
Good for pain, nausea, and stress relief 

5. Rafael 
Characteristics of Rafael: 

Sativa-dominant 
High CBD; up to 18.6% 
Low THC; as low as 1%

photo credit: RonAlmog via photopin cc

highlightedReviews.text: With a 2:1 CBD/THC ratio, this strain shouldn't get you too "high".  I cannot tolerate high amounts of THC so I thought this strain would be perfect.   It wasn't.   I don't know if it's just this particular crop,  but this was not the medicinal Avi-dekel I was led to believe it was (maybe that's why this shop now calls it something different (YiLo CBD) but,  when I bought it,  it was listed as Avi-dekel).  Regardless, I advise others to be very careful - one of the side effects of this strain was extreme depression.  EXTREME.   I am not depressed,  have never been treated for depression and have never had problem with depression but,  about 5 days after starting to use this strain,  I became very depressed.   While under its influence, the depressive effect was overwhelming. Absolutely horrible.  The heavy depressive effects lasted for about 5 hours after. I finally just stopped using it - still having a fair amount of it left.   That's how bad the depression was.
absolutely love this. helps my sleep and anxiety issues. don't feel high but feel relaxed.
